description: Try our easy to follow Turkey Casserole recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Stew & casserole,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Rice,Mince,Turkey,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Turkey Casserole Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a saucepan on medium. Add onion, garlic, herbs and chilli. Cook, stirring, for 2 minutes until soft. Add tomato and 1/2 cup of water. Reduce heat to mediumlow. Cover and simmer.

Meanwhile, mix mince, rice, parsley, paprika and an egg in a large bowl. Roll into walnutsized balls. Add balls to sauce and cook for 25-30 minutes, stirring, until balls are cooked through and sauce thickens slightly.
Bring stock to simmer in a saucepan. Add polenta in a steady stream, whisking continuously. Stir occasionally for 1015 minutes or until polenta is cooked.
Spoon polenta onto plates and top with meatballs and sauce.
